content: The Pine Ridge Journal reported community concerns about limited pelvic health specialist availability (current ratio 1:23,000 residents). Interviews highlighted challenges for athletes like ultra-marathoners needing specialized care. Health network CFO announced $2.1M expansion of physiotherapy services targeting underserved populations. Construction begins Q3 2024 at 3200 Sycamore Canyon Blvd with expected 40% increase in treatment capacity.
